title: What other words can “LOL” stand for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Speaking “lol” as a word, is “stupid” in Estonian. (Loll) the list of words that we Pretend Any Thing Means, is Ridiculous. Thinking only in English when Playing Out Initialisms and Acronyms (Monograms) Limits Our Learning. Lollipop has these 3 letters sequentially, as does “hello lovely”. But, on Oct 29 1969 attempting comp 2 comp (internet) thru arpanet communicating, the 1st 2 Letters were “LO”, before crashing. The Attempt was “LOGIN”. Altho “Lo” means “no” in Hebrew, and in Spanish “the, it, him”. Thru ATBASH Cipher, L=O. Each Letter has Numerical Valu and Nor Always the Same in Different Numerical Systems. Our species may be imaginative in thinking up witty sets of letters, and pretend they sumhow mean what they classify as. But they Do Not (Even These), Listen Observe Learn, because truly… Alla this's a Life Of Lies in a Lesbian On Lesbian world

I am at this very moment wearing a T-shirt - which I got free a couple of years ago (they were giving them away at a basketball game, I believe) - that says “LOL” on the front and “Life Of Luxury” on the back. It seems to be an ad for a new housing development (condominiums or apartments?), I think; I never bothered to call the phone number. So essentially it can stand for anything you like.
